item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Saturday, November 23, 2024 at 1:20 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Highest-resolution images ever captured of the sun’s entire surface (68 points | 18 comments)
2. We signed a famous AI company with a HackerNews post (13 points | discuss)
3. OpenMPTCProuter: Aggregate and encrypt multiple internet connections using MPTCP (68 points | 13 comments)

5. Quake 3 Source Code Review: Network Model (2012) (138 points | 30 comments)
6. Dear sir, you have built a compiler (2022) (235 points | 117 comments)

8. Alloy Automation (YC W20) Is Hiring ( | hide)
9. MaXX Interactive Desktop -- the little brother of the great SGI Desktop on IRIX (106 points | 31 comments)
10. An Analysis of the Performance of WebSockets in Various Programming Languages (2021) (62 points | 28 comments)
11. SQLite’s Use of Tcl (2017) (56 points | 14 comments)
12. RGFW: Single-header C99 window abstraction library (123 points | 35 comments)
13. Agent Blue – Arsenic-Laced Rainbow [pdf] (12 points | 4 comments)
14. Computer Networking Fundamentals – Learning Series (2023) (61 points | 5 comments)

17. Scientists Clone Two Black-Footed Ferrets from Frozen Tissues (46 points | 6 comments)

19. Futel (9 points | discuss)
20. Oxford accused of relying on young academics employed on gig-economy terms (22 points | 4 comments)
21. A simple semi-space collector – wingolog (30 points | 6 comments)
22. Show HN: Rebels in the sky – Terminal game about space pirates (208 points | 57 comments)
23. How the ZX Spectrum became a 1980s icon (27 points | 17 comments)
24. Understanding Google's Quantum Error Correction Breakthrough (150 points | 77 comments)
25. Americans see their savings vanish in Synapse fintech crisis (95 points | 84 comments)
26. Amazon to invest another $4B in Anthropic (592 points | 335 comments)
27. Nash equilibria in Ballmer's binary-search interview game (108 points | 26 comments)
28. Rendering "modern" Winamp skins in the browser (103 points | 34 comments)
29. Playground Wisdom: Threads Beat Async/Await (113 points | 56 comments)
30. How did you do on the AI art Turing test? (49 points | 50 comments)
